name: PixBeat (Greendot13)
description:
Description:

A simple rhythm game where you are a grey bar that must catch all notes (the boxes)

soundtracks available here!

Controls:

Up & Down Arrow Keys to move

Press ESC key to exit from a menu or a song

Credits:

Creator/Owner, Programmer, Artist, Musician: Greendot13

Artist: Hernán G CF
